meanings.sent1: The elephant is the biggest animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The biggest cake at the party was chocolate.
meanings.sent3: The biggest teddy bear in the store made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the biggest ray of sunshine in his day.
meanings.sent5: The biggest mountain in the world is Mount Everest.

meanings.sent1: Family is the biggest part of her life.
meanings.sent2: The biggest decision of his career was to start his own business.
meanings.sent3: The biggest book on the shelf was her favorite novel.
meanings.sent4: His biggest fear was losing his best friend.
meanings.sent5: The biggest lesson she learned was to always be kind.

meanings.sent1: The biggest company in town is expanding its operations.
meanings.sent2: The biggest player in the game scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent3: The biggest tree in the forest was known as the wise old oak.
meanings.sent4: Her biggest strength was her unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: The biggest star in the sky shone brightly every night.
